name: claude-orchestration
description: Enterprise multi-agent orchestration system with 97+ specialized agents, mandatory 6-phase protocol, and comprehensive DevOps workflows

plugins.name: home-assistant-architect
plugins.description: Complete Home Assistant platform with frontend design, energy management, cameras, sensors, local LLM integration, and Ubuntu server deployment. 15 agents, 16 MCP tools.

plugins.name: lobbi-platform-manager
plugins.description: Streamline development on the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha with Keycloak management, service orchestration, and test generation

plugins.name: iac-golden-architect
plugins.description: The Dredgen - Comprehensive Infrastructure as Code command center for multi-cloud Terraform, Harness CD, HashiCorp Vault, and Terraformer

plugins.name: frontend-design-system
plugins.description: 263+ design styles with multi-tenant Keycloak theming for AI-powered frontend development. 6 agents, 8 commands, 6 skills.

plugins.name: chakra-react-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit for React/Next.js projects using Chakra UI with accessibility auditing and theming tools

plugins.name: team-accelerator
plugins.description: Enterprise development toolkit for teams - DevOps, code quality, integrations, workflow automation, and performance optimization

plugins.name: container-workflow
plugins.description: Enforcer (Spartan) - Comprehensive Docker/Container workflow automation with CI/CD pipelines, security scanning (Trivy), release management, and 15 proactive agents for containerized application development

plugins.name: ahling-command-center
plugins.description: Sentinel (Promethean) - Comprehensive self-hosted infrastructure orchestration for 70+ services with deep Ollama, Home Assistant, and Microsoft Agent Framework integration. 10 agents, 15 commands, 8 skills, 32 MCP tools targeting 24-core/61GB RAM/RX 7900 XTX hardware.

plugins.name: fastapi-backend
plugins.description: Oracle (Promethean) - Production-ready FastAPI backend development toolkit with MongoDB/Beanie ODM, Keycloak authentication, Docker/K8s deployment, background tasks, caching, observability, and WebSocket support. 4 agents, 10 commands, 8 skills.

plugins.name: orchestrate-complex
plugins.description: Mendicant (Forerunner) - Advanced multi-agent orchestration system with DAG-based parallel execution, 4 orchestration patterns (Plan-then-Execute, Hierarchical Decomposition, Blackboard, Event Sourcing), mandatory 6-phase protocol enforcement

plugins.name: exec-automator
plugins.description: Genesis (Forerunner) - AI-Powered Executive Director Automation Platform - Analyze organizational responsibilities, score automation potential with 6-factor algorithm, generate LangGraph workflows, and deploy 11 specialized agents for trade associations and nonprofits

plugins.name: frontend-powerhouse
plugins.description: Titan (Spartan) - Maximum-capacity frontend development plugin with 13 specialized subagents, ultrathink integration, and comprehensive React/Next.js/Chakra UI tooling

plugins.name: fullstack-iac
plugins.description: Zenith (Forerunner) - Complete full-stack development and infrastructure automation. FastAPI, React/Vite, Ansible, Terraform, Kubernetes with production-ready templates and CI/CD pipelines.

plugins.name: agent-review-council
plugins.description: Tribunal (Forerunner) - Revolutionary multi-agent deliberation system with 20 protocols (Round Robin, AutoGen, Red/Blue Team, Six Thinking Hats, Appreciative Inquiry, etc.). 21 agents debate, vote, and reach consensus on code quality. Production-ready automation included.

plugins.name: aws-eks-helm-keycloak
plugins.description: Conduit (Standard) - AWS EKS deployments with Helm, Keycloak authentication, and Harness CI/CD. 7 commands, 4 agents, 6 skills for pipeline excellence and developer velocity.

plugins.name: claude-code-templating
plugins.description: Architect (Standard) - Universal templating and Harness expert plugin with multi-format support (Handlebars, Cookiecutter, Copier, Maven, Harness), 5 specialized agents, MCP integration, and automated CI/CD pipeline generation. 4 commands, 5 agents, 3 skills, 58 tests.

plugins.name: langgraph-architect
plugins.description: Architect (Standard) - Expert LangGraph/LangChain agent builder with comprehensive workflow orchestration, MCP integration, and CLI accessibility. 12 specialized agents, 8 commands, 6 skills covering StateGraph design, multi-agent patterns (supervisor, swarm, hierarchical), memory systems, tool integration, context engineering, and production deployment. Makes every LangGraph agent reachable via Claude Code CLI.

plugins.name: analytics-dashboard
plugins.description: Oracle - Seer of patterns and foresight. Provides comprehensive analytics including velocity tracking, burndown charts, cost analysis, forecasting, and team performance metrics. Integrates with Jira for sprint analytics and GitHub for development metrics.

plugins.name: autonomous-sprint-ai
plugins.description: Strategos - The Supreme Commander. Revolutionary self-governing sprint management AI that autonomously plans sprints, rebalances workloads, predicts blockers, negotiates scope, and makes real-time decisions. Operates with configurable autonomy levels from advisor to full autopilot.

plugins.name: code-knowledge-graph
plugins.description: Librarian - The Keeper of Infinite Archives. Builds a semantic knowledge graph of your entire codebase, understanding relationships between code entities, architectural patterns, data flows, and domain concepts. Enables impact analysis, architectural queries, and semantic code search.

plugins.name: code-quality-orchestrator
plugins.description: Curator - Ancient guardian of code excellence. Orchestrates 5 quality gates (Static Analysis, Test Coverage, Security Scanning, Complexity Analysis, Dependency Health) in a unified flow. Ensures pristine code through Forerunner precision and automated enforcement.

plugins.name: cognitive-code-reasoner
plugins.description: Didact - The Teacher of deep understanding. Revolutionary debugging and code analysis using extended thinking and multi-step cognitive reasoning. Employs hypothesis-driven debugging, causal chain analysis, temporal state reconstruction, and emergent bug pattern detection.

plugins.name: documentation-orchestrator
plugins.description: Scribe - Keeper of knowledge and wisdom. Orchestrates documentation generation including API docs, README files, architecture diagrams, code documentation, and knowledge base management. Integrates with Confluence for wiki sync and Obsidian for personal knowledge management.

plugins.name: git-workflow-orchestrator
plugins.description: Sentinel - Guardian of the codebase timeline. Orchestrates advanced Git workflows including trunk-based development, GitFlow, ship/show/ask patterns, branch protection, rebasing strategies, conflict resolution, and merge automation.

plugins.name: multi-model-orchestration
plugins.description: Conductor - The Orchestrator of Intelligences. Revolutionary multi-LLM orchestration that dynamically routes tasks to the optimal AI model (Claude, GPT, Gemini, Llama, Mistral) based on task characteristics, cost, latency, and capability matching.

plugins.name: notification-hub
plugins.description: Messenger - Voice across dimensions. Unified notification orchestration for Slack, Microsoft Teams, Discord, Email, and Webhooks. Manages approval workflows, escalation chains, and intelligent notification routing with digest and priority management.

plugins.name: predictive-failure-engine
plugins.description: Cassandra - The Oracle of Inevitable Fates. Revolutionary AI that predicts bugs and failures BEFORE they happen using pattern recognition, code smell analysis, historical failure correlation, and probabilistic modeling.

plugins.name: release-orchestrator
plugins.description: Herald - Announcer of new horizons. Orchestrates the complete release lifecycle including semantic versioning, changelog generation, release notes, deployment coordination, rollback management, and feature flag integration.

plugins.name: testing-orchestrator
plugins.description: Validator - Arbiter of truth and correctness. Orchestrates comprehensive testing including unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests, performance tests, and regression detection. Integrates with Jira for test case linking and CI/CD for automated test execution.

plugins.name: api-integration-helper
plugins.description: Connector - Production-ready API integration specialist. Orchestrates 10 agents to generate typed clients, auth flows, error handling, rate limiting, and mock servers from OpenAPI/GraphQL specs. Delivers enterprise-grade API integrations.

plugins.name: customer-data-migration-orchestrator
plugins.description: Terraformer - Universal data migration platform with source adapters. Like Terraform for infrastructure, but for customer data. Connect ANY source (Salesforce, HubSpot, Stripe, legacy DBs, CSVs) and automatically transform to YOUR target schema.

plugins.name: database-schema-designer
plugins.description: Architect - Master builder of data structures. Orchestrates production-grade database schema design, optimization, and evolution. Detects N+1 queries, suggests optimal indexes, plans zero-downtime migrations, and ensures schemas perform at scale.

plugins.name: debug-detective
plugins.description: Sherlock - Master investigator of code mysteries. Systematically debugs issues through hypothesis formation, evidence gathering, stack trace analysis, data flow tracing, git bisect automation, and state comparison.

plugins.name: dev-environment-bootstrap
plugins.description: Bootstrap - Developer onboarding accelerator. Analyzes project requirements, detects missing dependencies, generates Docker/docker-compose configs, creates .env templates, sets up pre-commit hooks, configures IDE settings (VSCode/Cursor).

plugins.name: fixer
plugins.description: Fixer - Error Resolution Engine. Diagnoses, fixes, and prevents common programming errors across TypeScript, Python, Rust, and Go. Features error-parsing, stack-trace-analysis, pattern-matching, and solution-search capabilities.

plugins.name: migration-wizard
plugins.description: Migrator - The architect of transformation. Orchestrates complex code migrations between frameworks, libraries, and API versions with precision codemods, incremental strangler fig patterns, and automated transformation.

plugins.name: testforge
plugins.description: TestForge - Master of quality assurance through intelligent test generation. Analyzes code behavior to auto-generate comprehensive tests that catch real bugs, not just boost coverage numbers. Supports Jest, Pytest, Vitest, and more.

plugins.name: jira-orchestrator
plugins.description: Arbiter - Enterprise Jira orchestration with 77 agents, 16 teams, 45 commands, 13 skills. Features Atlassian MCP OAuth, Harness integration, Neon PostgreSQL, Redis caching, Temporal workflows, and structured reasoning frameworks.
